CHUM_FULL: Centre hospitalier de l’université de Montréal
CITE_FULL: Hôpital de la Cité-de-la-santé CISSS Laval
ENTERRAMQ: Please enter your Health Insurance Number (RAMQ) without any spaces
ERRORANSWERNOTMATCH: Answer does not match our records
ERRORCONTACTINGHOSPITAL: Error contacting the hospital. Try again later
ERROR_NETWORK: Could not connect to the internet
FEEDBACK_MESSAGE: Your feedback is invaluable to us. Please take a moment to let us know what you think about Opal.
INACTIVE: For security purposes, you have been disconnected after 5 minutes of inactivity. Please log in again.
INTERNETERROR: Server error, please check your internet connection
INTERNETERROR2: Error connecting to the Opal network. If you are trying to enter your security answer and have made many mistakes, you will be locked out for a short time. Otherwise, the network may be temporarily not working. Please try again later.
KICKEDOUT: You have logged in on another device.
LEAVING_APP4: Note that you are leaving the app to open an external web browser.
OUTOFTRIES: Too many failed attempts - Please try again later.
PASSWORDRESETSERVERERROR: There seems to be an issue on our end regarding resetting your password. Please try resetting your password again. We apologize for any inconvenience.
PASSWORDSERVERERROR: There seems to be an issue on our end regarding your password. This could be due to a password reset that wasn't finalized correctly
RESET_PASSWORD_SENT: If your email address is in our system, an email will be sent to you to reset your password. Do not close the app while completing the password reset process.
RESETINSTRUCTIONS: Your password should be at least 8 characters long and should contain at least one number, one capital letter and one special character.
RESET_PASSWORD_CODE_INVALID: The authorization code used to reset your password is invalid. Please try again.
RESET_PASSWORD_CODE_EXPIRED: You took too long to reset your password. Please try again.
RESETTRUSTEDMESSAGE: It seems like you reset your password on a different device. Please set this phone to 'Untrusted' to clear your saved user data before logging in again. You will be able to set it as 'Trusted' next time you try to login.
RETRYRESETMESSAGE: Your password reset code was invalid. Please try resetting your password again.
SCREENSHOTTAKEN: Screenshot taken. If it was not you, exit the app.
SECURE_PHONE: Remember to secure your information by protecting your phone with a passphrase
SUBMITTING: Submitting... Please do not leave this page.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later.
TOUR_EDUCATION: In your Library tab, you will receive educational material as you progress through your treatment. We will show you videos, booklets and documents specific to you.
TOUR_GENERAL: In your General tab, you can see your treating team, announcements and parking information. You can also provide us with feedback on the app.
TOUR_HOME: In your Home tab, you will be provided with news about your medical status, documents and appointments.
TOUR_INFO: The Information button will give you any extra information if you need it. Press 'Close' if you want to exit the tour or you can press the left arrow to see the previous tips.
TOUR_MYCHART: In your Chart tab, you can see your appointments, documents and any other chart information.
TOUR_WELCOME_DESC: You can find all your radiotherapy data through this app. To get started, click on the arrow to change slide.
TRUST_DEVICE: Set this device as a trusted device?
UNATTENDED: Do not leave your phone unattended.
UPDATEMESSAGE: This version of Opal is no longer supported. Please update Opal to login.
SERVERERRORALERT: Server problem: could not fetch data, try again later
LONGERTIMEALERT: Request is taking longer than usual...please try again later..
